name: places/ChIJsQPN-25ZwokRBf202WwiRxc
formattedAddress: 401 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 401 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Relatively nice and wide selection of products. I went there for a quick sandwich as it was a relatively cheaper and quicker option compared to other spots in the area.

text.text: Relatively nice and wide selection of products. I went there for a quick sandwich as it was a relatively cheaper and quicker option compared to other spots in the area.

originalText.text: Nice store. Nice workers. But $1.50 for a slice of cheese is CRAZY!!! Regular bacon and egg is $3.99 but bacon egg and cheese is $5.49?? This isn’t a franchise where the prices are set, so deciding to charge a whole $1.50 extra just for one slice of cheese is literally robbery smh.. food is delicious, so I’ll pay the money but that’s just not making sense.!!

text.text: Nice store. Nice workers. But $1.50 for a slice of cheese is CRAZY!!! Regular bacon and egg is $3.99 but bacon egg and cheese is $5.49?? This isn’t a franchise where the prices are set, so deciding to charge a whole $1.50 extra just for one slice of cheese is literally robbery smh.. food is delicious, so I’ll pay the money but that’s just not making sense.!!

originalText.text: [NOTE: Ordered via Seamless app.] They got my order wrong on two separate occasions, and when I called the second time to report the issue, I was met with horrible customer service. The sandwich I ordered was missing key default ingredients that are listed in the item description (lettuce & tomato). When I called to bring this to their attention, the person I spoke to defiantly dismissed my concern and justified the error by saying "I only put in what's on the paper." Apparently, "the paper" only lists the customer's customizations (e.g., type of cheese, spreads, etc.), and he blamed me for not adding the standard ingredients. This is absurd because those are standard ingredients that CAN'T be added or removed when ordering in the Seamless app. Instead of offering any reasonable compensation for the error, his proposed solutions were to give my missing ingredients to the next customer who orders the same item, or to give me extra lettuce and tomato the next time I order. When I rejected these options, he hung up on me. I get that mistakes happen, but with customer service like this, there won't be a next time. Avoid.

originalText.text:
Enough is enough this place just raised their prices on the turkey sandwich from what was arrogant at $10.99 is now $14.00 for two pieces of rye bread turkey / cheese and a slice of tomato. They can go F themselves with these criminal prices never go in there cuz if you do you'll come out with your net worth dented. I can't imagine how much they raised their prices on everything else the lower prices they put on these boards is b******* compared to what you get charged at the register.  Total SCAMMERS

I've been living here for 20 years I'm willing to pay the highest for stuff the rest of the world pays a lot less for but the line has been crossed buy these clowns. Never again.

originalText.text:
They have the worst service ever!!!
It's always something in there I stopped buying my sandwiches there cuz they can't get my sandwich right! If I'm paying for something I expect to receive what I'm paying for not what they wanna make you! So I stopped buying my sandwiches ! I brought sliced watermelons in a cup and I smelled liked chemicals so I didn't eat It I took it back to get a refund the man at the register said he can't give me a refund and the reason it smells like chemicals is cause they spray them to keep them fresh. Well the Fruit shouldn't smell like cleaning products he said oh its expired we sold u expired fruit insaud would like a refund he said we can't give u a refund but I can choose another item . That's nasty If they sold me expired fruit why would I want anything else ? This is a health problem I'm taking this the the health department this is unsanitary and unhealthy he wouldn't give me my money back because he said he gave me a refund before on my sandwich.  And yes thts true but of course I want my refund why would I keep having them make a sandwich they can't get right! By the way this store has no signs tat say no refund he just kept saying it's not my fault it's expired and he can't give me a refund so this store out here selling expired products with no dates on them this a disgusting environment and I'm taking this to the health department!
